name: The Last of Us Part II
summary: Set 5 years after the events of The Last of Us, we see the return of Joel and Ellie. Driven by hatred, Ellie sets out for Seattle to serve justice. However, she begins to wonder what justice really means.

name: Angry Birds Fight!
summary: Angry Birds Fight! is a match puzzle game spin-off in the Angry Birds series. It debuted in January 2015 in Thailand and continued westward for further releases throughout 2015.

name: Junior Arithmancer
platforms: Linux, Web browser, PC (Microsoft Windows), Mac

name: Robots Vs Zombies: Transform To Race And Fight
summary: Robôs ou zumbis: quem vence essa batalha?

name: Super Mario World
platforms: Wii, New Nintendo 3DS, Wii U, Super Nintendo Entertainment System (SNES)
summary: Super Mario World is a jump-and-run platformer and a follow-up to Super Mario Bros. 3. The game retains many of the elements that debuted in Super Mario Bros. 3, such as the world map and Koopaling boss fights, while introducing a large variety of new gameplay mechanics, such as an expanded and less linear world map and the ability to save the game. Much of the game's introduced characters, game mechanics, and artistic themes influenced later titles in the Mario series. The game was released to best-selling status on the SNES, received large amounts of critical acclaim, and is commonly seen on Nintendo's best games of all times on various critic listings.

name: 15 seconds
summary: 15 Seconds is a 2d arcade in which you have to move forward, take down obstacles, avoid shots in the search for an exit, but remember that your time is limited. in no case do not touch anything, otherwise you will have to start all over again.

name: Insector X
summary: The player controls an insect-sized warrior named "Kai", who takes on a vast army of cyborg insects to free the insect world from the dark ruler queen. The game uses two buttons: an upgrade-able main shot and a seemingly random selection of secondary weapons.

name: Over the Alps: King of the Mountain
summary:
This major update consists of an entirely new, self-contained story written by Harry Tuffs (Sunless Skies, House of Many Doors), set just before the events of the base game and featuring a brand new main character. 
 
Join British Spy Annie Taylor as she’s taken from the comforts of Paris to deal with an urgent matter in Bern. Attempt to infiltrate the Swiss Grand Prix, tangle with Nazis, and encounter some familiar friends along the way…

name: Shadow of the Tomb Raider
platforms: Linux, Stadia, Xbox One, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 4, Mac
summary:
Experience Lara Croft's defining moment. 
 
As Lara Croft races to save the world from a Maya apocalypse, she must become the Tomb Raider she is destined to be. 
 
Become the Tomb Raider

name: The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing: Final Cut
genre: Adventure, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Indie, Role-playing (RPG)
summary: The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing: Final Cut is the definite collection of three stand-alone episodes told as one continuous story, with six playable classes and a new endgame mode with a huge variety of open missions.

name: Donkey Kong Country
platforms: Nintendo 3DS, Wii, Game Boy Advance, Wii U, Nintendo Switch, Game Boy Color, Virtual Console (Nintendo), Super Nintendo Entertainment System (SNES)
summary: Donkey Kong Country is a side scrolling platformer by British developers Rareware in 1994. It featured revolutionary pre-rendered 3D graphics that give the game a very unique look compared to most other games on consoles at the time. The two playable characters featured in the game are the titular character, Donkey Kong and his nephew, Diddy Kong. Together the two swing, climb, jump, swim, cartwheel, ride animals, and blast out of barrels on their way to recover their stolen bannanas from the evil King K. Rool and his Kremling army. The adventure takes you through a variety of different environments and levels that continually change up gameplay. Donkey Kong Country also provides plenty of opportunities for exploration with almost every level having a multitude of collectible, shortcuts, and hidden bonus areas.

name: Carmen Sandiego Word Detective
